mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tables ( shop_id, table_name, status, is_deleted ) VALUES ( #{shopId}, #{tableName}, #{status}, #{isDeleted} )
mapper.select: SELECT table_id AS tableId, shop_id AS shopId, table_name AS tableName, status, is_deleted AS isDeleted FROM tables WHERE shop_id = #{shopId} AND table_name = #{tableName} LIMIT 1
SELECT table_id AS tableId, shop_id AS shopId, table_name AS tableName, status, is_deleted AS isDeleted FROM tables WHERE shop_id = #{shopId} AND is_deleted = false
SELECT shop_id FROM tables WHERE table_id = #{tableId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tables WHERE table_id = #{tableId} AND status = 0 AND is_deleted = false
SELECT table_id AS tableId, shop_id AS shopId, table_name AS tableName, status, is_deleted AS isDeleted FROM tables WHERE table_id = #{tableId} AND is_deleted = false

SELECT customer_sessions_id AS customerSessionsId, table_id AS tableId, guest_count AS guestCount, started_at AS startedAt, ended_at AS endedAt, is_paid AS isPaid, total_amount AS totalAmount, note FROM customer_sessions WHERE table_id = #{tableId} AND ended_at IS NULL LIMIT 1

SELECT oi.order_item_id AS orderItemId, oi.order_id AS orderId, oi.menu_item_id AS menuItemId, oi.quantity, oi.ordered_at AS orderedAt, oi.is_canceled AS isCanceled, oi.nickname, oi.color_code AS colorCode, oi.status, oi.completed_by AS completedBy, oi.served_by AS servedBy, oi.completed_at AS completedAt, oi.served_at AS servedAt FROM order_items oi JOIN orders o ON oi.order_id = o.order_id JOIN customer_sessions cs ON o.session_id = cs.customer_sessions_id WHERE cs.table_id = #{tableId} AND cs.ended_at IS NULL AND oi.is_canceled = false AND oi.status = 2
